âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ VM management via command-line interface â€¢ TOML-based VM template definitions â€¢ Integration with cloud-hypervisor and linux-kvm â€¢ Network configuration using openvswitch â€¢ Fast VM provisioning with pipelight-init
ðŸ“– Summary: Virshle is a command-line utility written in Rust for managing virtual machines. It leverages cloud-hypervisor and linux-kvm for virtualization, openvswitch for network configuration, and pipelight-init for fast VM provisioning. It allows users to define VM templates in TOML files and manage VMs through a client-server architecture.
